events.synopsis: A promising student accidentally kills the driver of the vehicle Kimble is riding in. Kimble gets away, but the real danger is from the boy's father - a man determined to protect his son at any cost!
events.title: The Fugitive

events.synopsis: When astronaut Tony Nelson is forced to crash-land on a remote Pacific island, he finds a strange bottle that's washed ashore. When he opens it, out pops a genie named Jeannie.
events.title: I Dream Of Jeannie

events.synopsis: To celebrate Founders' Day, the town decides to pick a person at random to be Mayberry's guest of honour. Unfortunately, they pick a thief who's just been kicked out of the neighbouring county.
events.title: The Andy Griffith Show

events.synopsis: Sergeant Carter sets out to prove that a crook sold Gomer a dodgy watch.
events.title: Gomer Pyle, USMC

events.synopsis: When a local man claims he'll be marrying Joan Crawford, the boys of the 53rd are sent to bust a deceptive marriage broker who promises to match clients with celebrities.
events.title: Car 54, Where Are You?

events.synopsis: Chad and Joe attempt to persuade fellow ranger, Jess Moran, to step into the boxing ring with the self-appointed heavyweight champ of the Southwest.
events.title: Laredo

events.synopsis: A promising student accidentally kills the driver of the vehicle Kimble is riding in. Kimble gets away, but the real danger is from the boy's father - a man determined to protect his son at any cost!
events.title: The Fugitive

events.synopsis: Having recovered the loot from a series of holdups committed by a gang led by Charlie Sutter, Marshal Dillon becomes trapped in a shootout with the outlaws.
events.title: Gunsmoke

events.synopsis: An outlaw gang, led by the notorious Charlie Utter, tries to stop Marshal Dillon and recover the loot he has taken from them.
events.title: Gunsmoke

events.synopsis: Bohannan is a practicing faith healer who believes in his powers to heal. In Dodge City he is challenged by Doc as a charlatan, but Doc later comes to understand the deep psychological basis of Bohannan's work.
events.title: Gunsmoke

events.synopsis: After serving a prison sentence for army desertion, Musgrove arrives in Dodge seeking revenge against the man who caused his capture.
events.title: Gunsmoke

events.synopsis: A young Indian boy helps redeem Dan Shay, an ex-cavalry soldier who was responsible for crippling him during an attack on the boy's village.
events.title: Gunsmoke

events.synopsis: Fading rock star, Laurie Langley employs Ken to look after her son, Daniel. Laurie suspects her ex-husband is trying to kidnap the boy. The job escalates when Boon is attacked outside Daniel's school.
events.title: Boon

events.synopsis: Hired to discover who is behind a protection racket gang who have smashed mirrors and crockery at Harry's hotel, Boon decides to take the battle to the enemy.
events.title: Boon

events.synopsis: Will Orson agree to give Mork the promotion he so desperately wants and what will Mork's report be based on?
events.title: Mork & Mindy

events.title: Charles In Charge

events.synopsis: When Jonathan uncovers a scandal effecting dockworkers, a hit man is hired to kill Jennifer posing as a long lost cousin.
events.title: Hart To Hart

events.synopsis: A man steals the Constitution to bargain for control of border territory.
events.title: The Wild Wild West

events.synopsis: The people making headlines, the events shaping our world and the news that matters to you only on 'America's Newsroom'.
events.title: America's Newsroom

events.synopsis: Featuring an ensemble of four female panelists and one rotating male, the show will tackle top new headlines from all angles and perspectives.
events.title: Outnumbered

events.synopsis: Faulkner continues the conversation on the top news stories by utilizing the resources of FNC journalists in the field, plus one-on-one interviews.
events.title: Outnumbered Overtime

events.synopsis: Perino, a former White House press secretary, brings viewers insight into the White House daily briefing and much more from the Beltway.
events.title: The Daily Briefing with Dana Perino

events.synopsis: 'Bill Hemmer Reports' teams state-of-the-art newsgathering technology with Fox News Channel's leading correspondents to provide a comprehensive look at developing stories around the world.
events.title: Bill Hemmer Reports

events.synopsis: Your World, anchored by Neil Cavuto, covers all of the day's political and business news from Main Street to Wall Street.
events.title: Your World

events.synopsis: The Five is an opinion show featuring a roundtable ensemble with Greg Gutfeld, Dana Perino, Juan Williams and Jesse Watters who discuss, debate and at times debunk the hot news stories, controversies and issues of the day.?
events.title: The Five

events.synopsis: Join host Bret Baier and Fox's Team Washington to find out what's happening inside the Beltway and on the world stage.
events.title: Special Report

events.synopsis: “Squawk on the Street” is headquartered live on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange. We are there when the all-important opening bell rings every day.
events.title: Squawk On The Street

events.synopsis: "Squawk Alley" is the destination for news regarding tech on CNBC. Airing live from the floor of the New York Stock Exchange, we bring you all things you need to know focusing on the intersection of Wall Street and technology.
events.title: Squawk Alley US

events.synopsis: "Fast Money Halftime Report" is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.
events.title: Fast Money: Halftime Report

events.synopsis: CNBC’s “The Exchange” is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors.
events.title: The Exchange

events.synopsis: CNBC's Tyler Mathisen, Melissa Lee and Kelly Evans take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda.
events.title: Power Lunch

events.synopsis: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. CNBC's “Closing Bell” guides you through the most important hour of the trading day.
events.title: Closing Bell

events.synopsis: “Fast Money” is America’s post-market show. Hosted by Melissa Lee and a roundtable of top traders, “Fast Money” breaks through the noise of the day, to bring you the actionable news that matters most to investors.
events.title: Fast Money

events.synopsis: Anchored by Nancy Hungerford and Sri Jegarajah at the Singapore Exchange (SGX) and Bernie Lo at the Hong Kong studio, Squawk Box Asia is CNBC’s flagship show that sets the news agenda.
events.title: Squawk Box Asia

events.synopsis: Anchored by Martin Soong, Oriel Morrison and Tanvir Gill at the Singapore Exchange (SGX), Street Signs follows the day's biggest moves to provide CNBC's audience with actionable, real-time insights.
events.title: Street Signs Asia

events.synopsis: Hosted by Matthew Taylor at the Singapore Exchange (SGX) and Hadley Gamble at Abu Dhabi Global Market (ADGM), Capital Connection gives you a reading on Asia's markets mid-day and sets you up for the Middle East and European trading day.
events.title: Capital Connection

events.synopsis: During three hours of unscripted and dynamic debate, CNBC's flagship show leads you into the open of the European markets. Each trading day, anchors Geoff Cutmore, Steve Sedgwick and Karen Tso.
events.title: Squawk Box Europe

events.synopsis: One hour into Europe’s equity session, Street Signs provides price discovery, the street's view and a link to the business stories trending online and on social.
events.title: Street Signs Europe

events.synopsis: Broadcast from CNBC Global Headquarters in Englewood Cliffs, N.J., CNBC’s “Worldwide Exchange” will deliver essential, actionable information and analysis for anyone who wants to be part of the global business conversation.
events.title: Worldwide Exchange

events.synopsis: “Squawk Box” is the ultimate “pre-market” morning news and talk program, where the biggest names in business and politics tell their most important stories.
events.title: Squawk Box US

events.title: Squawk On The Street

events.synopsis: "Fast Money Halftime Report" is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.
events.title: Fast Money: Halftime Report

events.synopsis: CNBC’s “The Exchange” is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors.
events.title: The Exchange

events.synopsis: CNBC's Tyler Mathisen, Melissa Lee and Kelly Evans take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda.
events.title: Power Lunch

events.synopsis: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. CNBC's “Closing Bell” guides you through the most important hour of the trading day.
events.title: Closing Bell

events.synopsis: “Fast Money” is America’s post-market show. Hosted by Melissa Lee and a roundtable of top traders, “Fast Money” breaks through the noise of the day, to bring you the actionable news that matters most to investors.
events.title: Fast Money

events.synopsis: Anchored by Nancy Hungerford and Sri Jegarajah at the Singapore Exchange (SGX) and Bernie Lo at the Hong Kong studio, Squawk Box Asia is CNBC’s flagship show that sets the news agenda.
events.title: Squawk Box Asia

events.synopsis: Anchored by Martin Soong, Oriel Morrison and Tanvir Gill at the Singapore Exchange (SGX), Street Signs follows the day's biggest moves to provide CNBC's audience with actionable, real-time insights.
events.title: Street Signs Asia

events.synopsis: Hosted by Matthew Taylor at the Singapore Exchange (SGX) and Hadley Gamble at Abu Dhabi Global Market (ADGM), Capital Connection gives you a reading on Asia's markets mid-day and sets you up for the Middle East and European trading day.
events.title: Capital Connection

events.synopsis: During three hours of unscripted and dynamic debate, CNBC's flagship show leads you into the open of the European markets. Each trading day, anchors Geoff Cutmore, Steve Sedgwick and Karen Tso.
events.title: Squawk Box Europe

events.synopsis: One hour into Europe’s equity session, Street Signs provides price discovery, the street's view and a link to the business stories trending online and on social.
events.title: Street Signs Europe

events.synopsis: Broadcast from CNBC Global Headquarters in Englewood Cliffs, N.J., CNBC’s “Worldwide Exchange” will deliver essential, actionable information and analysis for anyone who wants to be part of the global business conversation.
events.title: Worldwide Exchange

events.synopsis: "Fast Money Halftime Report" is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.
events.title: Fast Money: Halftime Report

events.synopsis: CNBC’s “The Exchange” is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors.
events.title: The Exchange

events.synopsis: CNBC's Tyler Mathisen, Melissa Lee and Kelly Evans take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda.
events.title: Power Lunch

events.synopsis: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. CNBC's “Closing Bell” guides you through the most important hour of the trading day.
events.title: Closing Bell

events.synopsis: “Fast Money” is America’s post-market show. Hosted by Melissa Lee and a roundtable of top traders, “Fast Money” breaks through the noise of the day, to bring you the actionable news that matters most to investors.
events.title: Fast Money

events.synopsis: Anchored by Nancy Hungerford and Sri Jegarajah at the Singapore Exchange (SGX) and Bernie Lo at the Hong Kong studio, Squawk Box Asia is CNBC’s flagship show that sets the news agenda.
events.title: Squawk Box Asia

events.synopsis: Anchored by Martin Soong, Oriel Morrison and Tanvir Gill at the Singapore Exchange (SGX), Street Signs follows the day's biggest moves to provide CNBC's audience with actionable, real-time insights.
events.title: Street Signs Asia

events.synopsis: Hosted by Matthew Taylor at the Singapore Exchange (SGX) and Hadley Gamble at Abu Dhabi Global Market (ADGM), Capital Connection gives you a reading on Asia's markets mid-day and sets you up for the Middle East and European trading day.
events.title: Capital Connection

events.synopsis: During three hours of unscripted and dynamic debate, CNBC's flagship show leads you into the open of the European markets. Each trading day, anchors Geoff Cutmore, Steve Sedgwick and Karen Tso.
events.title: Squawk Box Europe

events.synopsis: One hour into Europe’s equity session, Street Signs provides price discovery, the street's view and a link to the business stories trending online and on social.
events.title: Street Signs Europe

events.synopsis: Broadcast from CNBC Global Headquarters in Englewood Cliffs, N.J., CNBC’s “Worldwide Exchange” will deliver essential, actionable information and analysis for anyone who wants to be part of the global business conversation.
events.title: Worldwide Exchange

events.synopsis: “Squawk Box” is the ultimate “pre-market” morning news and talk program, where the biggest names in business and politics tell their most important stories.
events.title: Squawk Box US

events.synopsis: “Squawk on the Street” is headquartered live on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange. We are there when the all-important opening bell rings every day.
events.title: Squawk On The Street

events.synopsis: Get ready to get your groove on because we've got the biggest and best hits from the 00s!
events.title: Nothing But The 00s

events.synopsis: All Night Long!: Good news... we've got your back! There's no need to go anywhere because we're bringing the party to you, and it's going All Night Long!
events.title: All Night Long!

events.synopsis: Let's go back to that weird, wacky and wonderful decade that was the 80s. Get ready to revel in big hair and shoulder pads!
events.title: We Are The 80s

events.synopsis: Tune in as we rewind back to the 90s, the decade that brought us grunge and girl power, not to mention some epic videos!
events.title: Smells Like The 90s

events.synopsis: Get ready to get your groove on because we've got the biggest and best hits from the 00s!
events.title: Nothing But The 00s

events.synopsis: MTV Classic gets your weekend off to a flyer with a selection of proper party starters, rollicking rock and pop anthems, and the coolest tracks ripping up discos throughout the ages!
events.title: Welcome To The Weekend!

events.synopsis: Prestige Chinese documentary production, tackling serious subjects with the best cinematography, editing, and all round production values with a unique Chinese perspective.
events.title: Special Edition

events.synopsis: A documentary series showcasing the history of China and its people.
events.title: Journeys and Discoveries

events.synopsis: A documentary series featuring historical and archaeological exploration.
events.title: History in the Frame

events.synopsis: Documentaries in this slot are rebroadcasts of our most-viewed and most popular stories of the season. They feature important social, economic, environmental or other policy-driven issues, affecting lives nationwide or simply in one small village. A broad
events.title: Today’s Top Pick

events.synopsis: A strand devoted to the nature and wildlife of China, the people who lived alongside them, and the great and diverse landscapes with which they all contend.
events.title: Humanities and Geography

events.synopsis: Real life stories told from the personal perspective. Moving, dramatic, sorrows and joys, expressed emphatically and expressed quietly. Watch closely to see and understand the real China as it is lived.
events.title: Living China
